overview: Social media influencer, 'DropTheMike', seeks thrills and stardom in the most horrific places. When heâ€™s offered the possibility of a lucrative sponsorship, he takes his online channel to one of the most haunted hotels in America. What begins as a fun challenge accompanied by friends descends into a personal hell, begging the timely question: how far would you go to pursue internet fame?
title: Followed
